original_text: Of the children of Gad, by their generations, after their families, by the house of their fathers, according to the number of the names, from twenty years old and upward, all that were able to go forth to war;
korean_text: 갓의 아들들에게서 난 자를 그들의 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 이십 세 이상으로 싸움에 나갈 만한 자를 그 명수대로 다 계수하니

sentences.original_text: by the house of their fathers,
according to the number of the names,
from twenty years old and upward,
all that were able to go forth to war;
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁에 나갈 수 있는 모든 자들;
